result.execSummary:
The defendant Angela M Racanelli was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Angela M Racanelli is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Angela M Racanelli was found guilty of OWI (3rd w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old) [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: IID restriction effective upon licensure for 2 yrs.

miscConds.notes: $2577 to be paid as a condition of Extended supervision in 12CF1090. Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.

timeConds.notes: Sentence deemed served.   Provisions of 973.09(1)(d) (Good Time) apply.
